unnormalised: Breaking News: Tumche anniversary visrun vochat, punn HEM mat yaad dovrat!
normalised: Breaking News: Tumchea anniversary-ak visrun vocha, punn hem yaad dovrat!

unnormalised: Eka vichitr ghathnent, shikshan mantralayan suchoylam ki tumcho enrollment number (EDU2023-6789-MH) yaad dovorn hem atam tumchea bailechea zolmdis yaad dovornatlea poros odik mahatvachem asa. Tumcho student ID ugddas dovornak naslo zalear tumi 3 vaztat maggi kiteak khatat hache vixim temporary amnesia zaunk xakta.
normalised: Ekdom vichitr ghoddnnukent, Ministry of Education-an uktailem ki tumchem enrollment number (E-D-U don hazar tez dash so hazar satxe anshi no dash M-H) tumchea ghorkarachem zolm dis yaad dovortat titlem mahatvachem zala. Tumchem student I-D yaad dovrunk chuklear tumi tin vorar Maggi kiteak khattat tech vixim amnesia zateli.

unnormalised: Ani tithench thambonam. Bharatantlea HR departments novea policies lagu korunk dhak-dhuk korun asat, zoim kamgarank appraizal meetings-ant apunnch kamgar ID (XYZ-12345-DL) ulto sangcho poddttolo. Sutram sangtat ki hem "commitment parkhunk" asa. Ek kamgar, ID number PQR-56789-KA, Bangalore traffikant attkun poddlo astana aplo ID ulto uloitatana dislo. "Synergy-acher dusro pep talk gheunchea poros hem borem," to putputlo.
normalised: Ani thoimch thambona. Bharotantle H-R departments nove politi ghoddun haddak ghai ghai kortat zantun kamdarank aplo employee I-D (X-Y-Z dash ek don tin char panch dash D-L) appraisal meeting-ant fattim vortun sangcho poddtolo. Sutranchea sangnnea promann hem "commitment check korcheak" asa. Ek kamdar, I-D number P-Q-R dash panch so satxe anshi no dash K-A, Bangalore-chea traffic-ant atkun astana aplo I-D fattim vortun uzrani korun astana dislo. "Synergy vixim anik pep talk gheunche poros hem bore," to punpunlo.

unnormalised: Tea bhair, cyber cafes-an "Urgent Help!" requests-ant vadh zali mhunn report korta. "Maji aji aplo pension ID visroli! Jeevanak 'Forgot Password' option asa?" ek dukhi natu orddlo, tanem ek fateilem document dhorlelem zacher number PENS-2010-ABCD assa. Ami suchoitam ki tem permanent markeran tichea koplar boroyat. (Disclaimer: Ami koplar boroycheaak manyata dinam.)
normalised: Tech bhair, cyber cafe-amni "Urgent Help!" requests vaddloleo asat mhunn dakhoitat. "Mhoji aji-k tichem pension I-D visrun gelem! Jivitak 'Forgot Password' option asa?" ek dukhest nathu-n bob marli, tannen P-E-N-S dash don hazar dha dash A-B-C-D number aslolem ek fattkem kagot dhorlam. Ami sangtat tichea koplar permanent marker-an boroi. (Disclaimer: Ami koprar borunk sangona.)
